lines.text: I've known a lot of go-getters. I've been pallbearer to about ten of 'em. They're just so darn busy goin' and gettin', they didn't have time to breathe.
Oh no, I've got no respect for anybody who was born lazy. That's like being born a king. They didn't do anything to get there. Oh, I had to develop it. Took me a long time to get where I am.
That kiss took five years off my life... ...hey, careful, I'll be too young to vote!
Wives seldom believe in insurance, but widows always do.
As Benjamin Franklin said, Go Soak your Head!
